titleStmt.title: A discourse shewing who they are that are now qualify'd to administer baptism and the Lord's-Supper wherein the cause of episcopacy is briefly treated / by the author of A discourse proving the divine institution of water-baptism.
titleStmt.author: Leslie, Charles, 1650-1722.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for C. Brome W. Keblewhite and H. Hindmarsh,

notesStmt.note: Includes text in Greek and Latin.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
